thread.title: Former NBA star Odom found unconscious at Nevada brothel

title: Former NBA star Odom found unconscious at Nevada brothel
text:

The Nuggets defeated the Clippers 107-92. (Photo by Doug Pensinger/Getty Images) (Photo: Doug Pensinger, Getty Images) 49 CONNECT 10 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
LAS VEGAS (WUSA9) -- According to a TMZ report , Former NBA star Lamar Odom was air lifted to the hospital on Tuesday after being found unconscious in a Las Vegas brothel. 
According to the report, Odom was airlifted to the hospital after taking too much of "an herbal substitute for Viagra." 
Odom was reportedly at the Las Vegas brothel all by himself for days on end. 
The report noted that Odom was found by a woman inside the brothel, who called 911. Odom was seen with a "mucus-type liquid coming out of his nose and mouth," according to the report. Further details have yet to be released on the situation.
